    • Method Detail

      • notifyObserver

        public void notifyObserver​(java.lang.Object arg)
        Everytime that model changes, it sends all the information to the virtual view through a jsonString. The virtual view will deserialize jsonString to see what is changed and will send changes to playersNicknames.
        Specified by:
        notifyObserver in interface Observer
        Parameters:
        arg - the new json snapshot
